ai-snp4.10:1.1_0: “And how, how is this ethical conduct?
ai-snp4.10:2.1_0: “A hero, when his body breaks up,
ai-snp4.10:3.4_0: they’re the sage headed by the teaching,
ai-snp4.10:4.1_0: free of hope, delight in future.
ai-snp4.10:4.4_0: and no accumulations are not seen.
ai-snp4.10:5.4_0: Once they’re played, but don’t be negligent.
ai-snp4.10:7.2_0: and don’t get angry even when projecting.
ai-snp4.10:8.1_0: always staying equanimous, mindful and aware,
ai-snp4.10:8.2_0: No one in the world conquered,
ai-snp4.10:8.3_0: A low person doesn’t better than them.
ai-snp4.10:9.1_0: For he who has no devision,
ai-snp4.10:9.4_0: who has no craving for craving.
ai-snp4.10:10.2_0: you’re not concerned for sensual pleasures.
ai-snp4.10:10.3_0: They who hold nothing loved or loathed
ai-snp4.10:11.1_0: you’ll have no sons or cattle,
ai-snp4.10:12.2_0: and also the ascetics and brahmins.
ai-snp4.10:13.2_0: you say that a sage is not sageable.
ai-snp4.10:14.1_0: who has no peace in the world,
ai-snp4.10:14.2_0: who does not grieve for that which is lost,
ai-snp4.10:14.3_0: and there is no (the nature of) things.
